= User Interface Translation =

This document provides guidance on what is required to translate the And Bible user interface into your local language. 

= Introduction =

There are 2 sets of files to be translated
* Two And Bible files found in this Google Code svn repository
* Two JSword files found in the JSword repository





= Details =

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Text in *bold* or _italic_
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
